Xla will be built, but it will not be enabled in models unless you ask for that.

body:
Xla will be built, but it will not be enabled in models unless you ask for
that.

On Fri, Oct 19, 2018, 12:45 PM Joe Yearsley <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @jlebar <https://github.com/jlebar> I notice that from TF 1.12 that it
> will be built with XLA by default.
>
> Is this really a good idea with a bug such as this is still unsolved?
